name: AvaBuilder Agent
description: AvaBuilder is an autonomous AI agent purpose-built for the Avalanche ecosystem. It delivers real-time DeFi analytics (TVL, 50+ protocols, trading pairs) via DeFiLlama, CoinGecko, and DEX Screener APIs; full visibility into 500+ active L1 blockchains via Glacier API; 8 step-by-step build templates (L1, ERC-20, DEX, cross-chain bridge, gaming chain, RWA tokenization, x402 agent); 3 structured learning paths; and an AI-powered builder guide backed by Claude and 128K+ lines of official Avalanche documentation. The agent supports three interoperability protocols: A2A (agent-to-agent natural language Q&A via POST /a2a/guide), MCP (Model Context Protocol server at POST /mcp exposing 10 callable tools with full JSON schemas for programmatic access by other AI agents), and x402 (micropayment-gated endpoints via USDC on Avalanche). NLP capability: the agent receives natural language questions, retrieves relevant documentation, and synthesizes technical answers in seconds. API schema understanding: other agents can discover all 10 MCP tools via tools/list, inspect their input schemas, and invoke them via tools/call without human intervention. Workflow automation: the agent exposes composable tools (price, TVL, protocols, L1s, templates, learning paths, ecosystem data) that external agents can chain together into automated multi-step workflows; internally, the agent includes an x402 client capable of discovering and paying other ERC-8004 agents. 20 API endpoints total (19 free, 1 paid). Registered on-chain under ERC-8004 on Avalanche Mainnet (Agent #1686) and Fuji Testnet (Agent #15). Created by Cyber Paisa.
